HERO.NAME: Kacper
HERO.TITLE: I create modern web applications with Angular.
HERO.LEAD: I graduated with a Master's degree in Applied Computer Science from Jagiellonian University. Currently, I work as a Front-end Developer at Comarch, where I develop a reporting system for time tracking and report generation — tailored to the needs of both small and large companies.
HERO.STATEMENT: I work daily with the latest versions of Angular, focusing on quality, performance, and modern UX. I have experience in ERP sector projects and co-create scalable, user-friendly solutions. I passionately follow the development of artificial intelligence and implement its capabilities into everyday work to continuously improve productivity and efficiency of delivered systems.

STACK.TOOLS: GIT (GitLab/GitHub), JIRA, CI/CD, Google Workspace, Figma
STACK.AI_TOOLS: AI Tools: GitHub Copilot, Google Gemini, ChatGPT, Claude Code

COMARCH_CLOUD.HIGHLIGHT_1: I collaborate daily with UX and backend teams, ensuring refined UX and meeting business needs.
COMARCH_CLOUD.HIGHLIGHT_2: I modernize and refactor the application: library updates, architecture improvements, and code maintainability.
COMARCH_CLOUD.HIGHLIGHT_3: I modernized the project (Angular 14 → 20): migration to standalone components, OnPush, and Signals; reduced dependency on zone.js.
COMARCH_CLOUD.HIGHLIGHT_4: I co-create a product for a new client; working in a dynamically developing project.
COMARCH_CLOUD.HIGHLIGHT_5: I consciously use AI tools (GitHub Copilot, ChatGPT, Google Gemini) to increase work efficiency and quality.

COMARCH_HEALTHCARE.HIGHLIGHT_1: Onboarding to the organization and working with tools: Jira and GitLab.
COMARCH_HEALTHCARE.HIGHLIGHT_2: Development of an internal application module: collecting statistics from the application and presenting them in a view.
COMARCH_HEALTHCARE.HIGHLIGHT_3: Creating charts and clear data visualization (including Chart.js).
COMARCH_HEALTHCARE.HIGHLIGHT_4: Writing unit tests for the statistics module (Jasmine, Karma).
COMARCH_HEALTHCARE.HIGHLIGHT_5: Implementation and maintenance of the application in Angular (Angular 15).

APP_1.TITLE: GraveMap
APP_1.DESCRIPTION: An application for recording and navigating between graves of loved ones in the cemetery.

APP_2.TITLE: AutoPuls
APP_2.DESCRIPTION: Vehicle logbook application with additional AI features.

MEGAK.TITLE: MegaK
MEGAK.DESCRIPTION: 14-month course consisting of 9 stages of programming in various technologies such as JavaScript, Node, Express, TypeScript, React, NestJS, and knowledge of MySQL and MongoDB databases

NODEJS.TITLE: NodeJS
NODEJS.DESCRIPTION: 13-hour NodeJS course covering Web Server, Layouts, MongoDB Database, Forms, Authentication, API, Deployment

GOOGLE_DATA.TITLE: Google Data Analyst
GOOGLE_DATA.DESCRIPTION: Exploring and Preparing your Data with BigQuery • Creating New BigQuery Datasets and Visualizing Insights • Achieving Advanced Insights with BigQuery • Applying Machine Learning to your Data with GCP

GOOGLE_CLOUD.TITLE: Google Associate Cloud Engineer
GOOGLE_CLOUD.DESCRIPTION: Google Cloud Fundamentals: Core Infrastructure • Essential Google Cloud Infrastructure: Foundation • Essential Google Cloud Infrastructure: Core Services • Elastic Google Cloud Infrastructure: Scaling and Automation • Reliable Google Cloud Infrastructure: Design and Process

ANGULAR_PERFORMANCE.TITLE: Angular Performance. Building High-Performance Angular Applications
ANGULAR_PERFORMANCE.DESCRIPTION: Advanced course focused on optimizing Angular application performance. Covers Change Detection, OnPush, trackBy, lazy loading, bundle size optimization, tree shaking, and leveraging the latest Angular Signals techniques to create ultra-fast applications.

ANGULAR_ADVANCED.TITLE: Angular – Advanced Course. SPA Web Application Framework
ANGULAR_ADVANCED.DESCRIPTION: Comprehensive course on advanced Angular techniques. Routing, lazy loading modules, advanced reactive forms, dependency injection, HttpClient, RxJS operators, state management, and SPA application architecture following best practices.

ANGULAR_SSR.TITLE: Angular - Building SSR Applications. Latest Features in Angular Framework
ANGULAR_SSR.DESCRIPTION: Course dedicated to Server-Side Rendering in Angular. Angular Universal, hydration, SEO optimization, prerendering, transfer state, and the latest Angular features such as standalone components, inject(), input/output functions, and control flow.
